sentences.english: During summer, Kiwi birds have a tough time surviving the rodent population boom.
sentences.chinese: 夏季，齧齒動物數量大增，鷸鴕生存艱難。

sentences.english: New Zealanders proudly display their kiwi , a native flightless bird.
sentences.chinese: 紐西蘭人則驕傲地展示他們的鷸鴕，一種不會飛的鳥。

sentences.english: Kiwi, long-beaked chicken-sized birds that cannot fly, live only in New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 鷸鴕鳥嘴比鳥的嘴有長很多，不會飛，生活在新西蘭。

sentences.english: Kiwis are, and so are these hawks trapped near Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 鷸鴕和這些鷹因此被困在南極洲。

sentences.english: Kiwi are endangered and cannot fly.
sentences.chinese: 鷸鴕是瀕危物種，它不會飛行。
